original_title: It's All Worth Living For: The First Ten Years
overview: In 2020—one month before the world shut down—Chicago-born videographer Alex Zarek flew to Albuquerque, New Mexico, to spend a week with Levi (The Poet) Macallister: documenting his work, interviewing his friends and family, and capturing the places that have made Levi The Poet what it is.
title: It's All Worth Living For: The First Ten Years
